name: Mycelius Rex | Happy Fun Kill Club Series 1
description: Common Mushroom King Character Card for use in the Happy Fun Kill Club game.

attributes.value: Spore Galore is a ranged attack that costs 5 energy to use and can cause a maximum of 80 damage.
Fungal Tonic is a supporting action that costs 2 energy to use and can heal this character or an ally by up to 25health points if it is effective.
Mycelium Shield is a ranged supporting action that costs 2 energy to use and can increase this character or an ally's defend by 20 points if it is effective.
